Articles.Content:
Hello , 

my brother gave me PS4 after he upgraded to 5 ! Working all good ,done factory reset am now I can’t connect the controller ! So stuck on page connect the control an press ps button ! I’m not using PlayStation usb would this be a prob even thou it’s charging the control! 
thank you

This isn't a place for ps4 support it's for KSP Enhanced Edition support. I suggest you ask on the ps4 support forums
